name: Moonstone Renewer
simpleDescription: Your heals and shields cool down faster and have greater effect on low health allies

passives.name: Starlit Grace
passives.effects: {{tip|Heal|Healing}} or {{tip|shield|shielding}} an allied champion chains the effect to the other nearest allied champion within {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} 800 units of them (''excluding yourself''), granting them 30% of the heal or 35% of the shield's initial strength. If no other allied champions are in the radius, grant the same target an additional 30% of the heal or 35% of the shield.
